Class Generador

  • java.lang.Object
    • mundo.Generador

  • public class Generador
extends java.lang.Object
    The task if this class is to generate the number which the player will have to reach this number has to be composed by different numbers in each position.
    Author:
    Cristian Guatuzmal

      • generarNumero

        public int generarNumero(int numeroDeCifras)
        This method generates the number that will be given by the class and which the player has to reach
        Parameters:
        numeroDeCifras - is 10 exposed to the number of digits, is always a exponent of 10. this value is obtained from generarNumeroParaGenerador(int)
        Returns:
        result, which is the final number, which matches all the conditions.

      • revisarNumero

        public boolean revisarNumero(int numeroARevisar,
                             int numeroDeCifras)
        This class verifies if the number has different numbers in all its positions, if affirmative, will give true, else, it will give false
        Parameters:
        numeroARevisar - is the number that will be checked
        numeroDeCifras - is the number of digits the number will have
        Returns:
        resultado, which is true if the number matches the conditions and false if not

      • generarNumeroParaGenerador

        public int generarNumeroParaGenerador(int numeroDeCifras)
        This method generates the 10 potentia that will multiply in generarNumero(int) to make the decimal random match the number of digits
        Parameters:
        numeroDeCifras - is the number of zeros necessary to obtain the number to multiply
        Returns:
        a 10 potentia who will mulltiply de zero base decimal of math random
